title: Go Gravel, Go Home: Strava ‘Trend Report’ for 2023 Shows 55 Percent Growth in Gravel Riding
content:
Strava's end-of-year data-dive highlights speeds, motivations, and mileage of its users in 2023 – where do you stack up?

Read the full article at Go Gravel, Go Home: Strava ‘Trend Report’ for 2023 Shows 55 Percent Growth in Gravel Riding on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
